main event: A civilian observed a single unidentified flying object in Schuyverville, New York on July 24, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as oval in shape, resembling a disc., It appeared the size of a grapefruit when hovering, making its altitude difficult to discern., The colors reported were red, white, blue, and green., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes., No sound was detected during the observation.
